apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this emoji depicts two women sharing a tender kiss, rendered with Apple’s signature soft rounded edges and a smooth, realistic lighting effect. Their medium-light skin tones are subtly shaded, giving them a warm and lifelike appearance, further enhanced by glossy 3D highlights that emphasize their gentle embrace. This representation of affection and romance, unique to Apple’s inclusive emoji set, conveys deep feelings of love and partnership in digital conversations.
